architectural_resources: PostgreSQL database (uses PG_DSN env var; likely AWS RDS Postgres) (api/sql.go)
Container registry for image storage (GitHub Actions references Amazon ECR) (.github/workflows/go.yml)
Container orchestration/service runtime (GitHub Actions references Amazon ECS) (.github/workflows/go.yml)
Secrets management for DB credentials (GitHub Actions references AWS Secrets Manager secret mehlj_lab_creds) (.github/workflows/go.yml)
Load balancer/public endpoint (GitHub Actions references ALB URL output) (.github/workflows/go.yml)
